attributes.action: To investigate this posibility of hospital infections related  to the use of growth pomoting Antibiotics used in rearing live stock
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
inform the public of the nature of neglect by food ministers in the past who allowed the use of antibiotics in the rearing of livestock not to protect the public health but to promote rapid growth in the animals in the lead up to slaughter.
The use of these antibiotics has caused new strains of bugs to develop in the human gut which lay dormant for weeks and even 10s of years or until the day you need the all important surgical operation,this should be public knowledge.The prime minister must have a public enquiry into this and the findings released to the general public regardless of how politicaly damaging it may be
